name: Crystal Arena: a MOBA-like Strategy Game
blurb: A DotA and LoL influenced strategy game with legendary bosses and epic adventures!

rewards.reward:
Einherjar
==============================
Special Thanks and a digital hug! 
You will have access to our secret backer only updates, including the announcement of the new Einherjar. 
You will also receive this most voted new Einherjar when the game is released. 
Your name will be credited in 'Special Thanks' on our website.

Bronze (Early Bird) ============================== Einherjar tier plus ++++++++++++++++ Pre-order the full version of the game. You will receive a full version of the game with all 10 Einherjar unlocked. (Value: $30)

Bronze (Early Bird) For PC/Mac ============================== Einherjar tier plus ++++++++++++++++ Pre-order the full version of the game for PC or Mac! You will receive a digital copy of the game with all 10 regular Einherjar unlocked. (Value: $30)\r\n============================== \r\nThe other $15 early bird tier above is for mobile.

Bronze \r\n============================== Einherjar tier plus ++++++++++++++++ Pre-order the full version of the game for Mobile, PC or Mac! You will receive a digital copy of the game with all 10 regular Einherjar unlocked. (Value: $30)
Silver ============================== Bronze tier plus ++++++++++++++++ HD Wallpapers, Digital OST and Digital Artbook.
Gold ============================== Silver tier plus ++++++++++++++++ Access to the early beta test, your voice will be heard and the game will become a better game because of you.

Platinum ============================== Silver tier plus ++++++++++++++++ Access to the pre-release beta, you can play the game ahead of other players. Your data will persist when the game is released.
Diamond- the Steam Gunner ============================== Platinum tier plus ++++++++++++++++ A Kickstarter Exclusive Einherjar, Gina the Steam Gunner, a legendary Einherjar for Kickstarter only.
Diamond- the Wolf Samurai ============================== Platinum tier plus ++++++++++++++++ A Kickstarter Exclusive Einherjar, Arashi the Wolf Samurai, a legendary Einherjar for Kickstarter only.
Diamond- the Secret Base ============================== Platinum tier plus ++++++++++++++++ Access to the hidden levels (for Kickstarter only) in the game

Chaos - Kickstarter Exclusive Pack (Early Bird) ============================== Platinum tier plus ++++++++++++++++ Both 2 Exclusive Einherjars and also access to the hidden levels. Your name will be credited in 'Special Thanks' in the game.

Chaos - Kickstarter Exclusive Pack ============================== Platinum tier plus ++++++++++++++++ Both 2 Exclusive Einherjars and also access to the hidden levels. Your name will be credited in 'Special Thanks' in the game.

Extreme \u2013 Crystal Arena Physical Pack (Early Bird) ============================== Chaos tier plus +++++++++++++++++ A Crystal Arena T-shirt, A hard cover art book, a CD of the OST and a figure of the minion.
Extreme \u2013 Crystal Arena Physical Pack ============================== Chaos tier plus +++++++++++++++++ A Crystal Arena T-shirt, A hard cover art book, a CD of the OST and a figure of the minion.

Ultimate - Customized Enemy ============================== Chaos tier plus ++++++++++++++++ We design an in-game enemy based on your concept. You will be credited as 'SPECIAL GUEST' in the game. (*must be within the reasonable range)

Ultimate - Customized Level ============================== Chaos tier plus ++++++++++++++++ We design a special in-game level including 3 maps, 3 enemies and 1 boss based on your concept. You will be credited as 'SPECIAL GUEST' in the game. (*must be within the reasonable range)

Infinity ============================== Chaos tier plus ++++++++++++++++ We design a new Einherjar based on your concept, including name, appearance and skills. Also, you can voice your Einherjar if you have the necessary equipment. You will be credited as 'ASSOCIATE PRODUCER' in the game. (*must be within the reasonable range)
